Your priority ranking score indicates that you don\'t talk to your priority contacts nearly enough! This could mean you are in danger of losing touch to people you really care about. Consider chatting with them!
"Your priority ranking indicates that you could work on maintaining your most valuable relationships. The less you talk to the contacts you prioritize, the more likely you risk losing touch to them. Consider chatting with them!"
"Your priority ranking indicates that you have taken time to give attention to the relationships you prioritize, but you have room to improve. Remember, the more time you take to connect with your priority contacts, the less likely you will lose touch."
"Your priority ranking indicates that you have taken time to give attention to the relationships you prioritize, and understand the value of taking time to connect with the people you care about! As you spend time talking with your prioritized relationships, the more likely these relationships will be maintained and continued to be valued. "
